body:
Was wondering if anyone was doing some free banner art for people and if I could get another, as after the name change and skin change, my banner is pretty irrelavent. 


Thanks, 

-Stimulating/Shadow

title: Banner Art: YT

replies.body:
I can make you some! Add me on Skype if you haven't already: TynvaleTop5

The only problem is that I can't di skins in the art, haven't learnt that yet :P
